an6.6:1.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato ranno bhadro assajaniyo rajaraho hoti rajabhoggo, ranno angantveva sankham gacchati.
an6.6:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno bhadro assajaniyo khamo hoti rupanam, khamo saddanam, khamo gandhanam, khamo rasanam, khamo photthabbanam, balasampanno ca hoti.
an6.6:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi angehi samannagato ranno bhadro assajaniyo rajaraho hoti rajabhoggo, ranno angantveva sankham gacchati.
an6.6:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an6.6:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti rupanam …pe… khamo dhammanam.
an6.6:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
